name: Student of the week
details: I was awarded the student of the week award in year 10 for helping my peers. This award was recognized by my headteacher and it was a great honor to receive it. I was able to help my peers with their studies and assignments, and I believe that this award reflects my dedication to helping others and my commitment to academic excellence.

name: Cisco Networking Certification Lvl 2
details: Cisco Networking Certification Lvl 2  is a module to test my knowledge on fundamental networking concepts often requested in networking roles in IT positions. I achieved this as part of the module for my BTEC Level 3 Extended Diploma in IT.

name: freeCodeCamp.org: JavaScript Algorithms and Data Structures
details: I have successfully completed the freeCodeCamp.org: JavaScript Algorithms and Data Structures Developer Certification. This certification represents approximately 300 hours of coursework and validates my knowledge on fundamental JavaScript concepts including variables, arrays, objects, loops, and functions. I have applied this knowledge by creating algorithms to manipulate strings, factorialize numbers and even solve hard algorithms.

name: Code Academy: Full-Stack Engineer
details: I have completed the Code Academy: Full-Stack Engineering professional certificate. This certificate validates my knowledge on full-stack web development, including front-end and back-end development, databases, and deployment. I have learned how to build web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, Express, SQL, and more. Completing this certificate proves that I have the skills required to develop and deploy full-stack web applications.
